column1: Little Goat Diner////It was hard to pick a item off the extensive menu that was offered
column2: too many items that I wanted to try out - usually for breakfast I go for the pancakes / french toast but what caught my eye was the smoked hash in duck fat
column3: not sure why I picked it maybe because it sounded good. The food came fast and at first glance
column4: looks very appealing but after a few bites
column5: the dish started to accumulate grease and getting heavy to eat
column6: though washing the food down with coffee did not help the cause. What helped me finish the dish was to tilt the entree in a slant to help drain the duck fat.
